name: should query WR fantasy stats with year splits and sort by points per game, seasonlogs, careerlogs, plays, and keeptradecut
description: Test case for should query WR fantasy stats with year splits and sort by points per game, seasonlogs, careerlogs, plays, and keeptradecut
expected_query: with "base_years" as (SELECT unnest(ARRAY[2017,2018,2019,2020,2021,2022,2023,2024]) as year), "player_years" as (SELECT DISTINCT player.pid, base_years.year FROM player CROSS JOIN base_years WHERE player.pos IN ('WR')), "t65bedcdf310669d8674ff5764eb5987e" as (select "pg"."pid", ROUND((1.5 * COUNT(CASE WHEN nfl_plays.trg_pid = pg.pid THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) / NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN trg_pid IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0)) + (0.7 * SUM(CASE WHEN nfl_plays.trg_pid = pg.pid THEN nfl_plays.dot ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(SUM(nfl_plays.dot), 0)), 4) as weighted_opp_rating_from_plays, "nfl_plays"."year" from "nfl_plays" inner join "player_gamelogs" as "pg" on "nfl_plays"."esbid" = "pg"."esbid" and "nfl_plays"."off" = "pg"."tm" where not "play_type" = 'NOPL' and ("trg_pid" is not null) and "nfl_plays"."year" in (2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, 2023) and "nfl_plays"."seas_type" in ('REG') group by "pg"."pid", "nfl_plays"."year") select "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."points_per_game" AS "points_per_game_from_seasonlogs_0", "t65bedcdf310669d8674ff5764eb5987e"."weighted_opp_rating_from_plays" AS "weighted_opp_rating_from_plays_0", "player_seasonlogs"."espn_overall_score" AS "espn_overall_score_0", "t110e335d6cf25991e052056ab308d608"."v" AS "player_keeptradecut_value_0", "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."year", "player"."pos" from "scoring_format_player_seasonlogs" as "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3" inner join "player" on "player"."pid" = "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid" left join "t65bedcdf310669d8674ff5764eb5987e" on "t65bedcdf310669d8674ff5764eb5987e"."pid" = "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid" and t65bedcdf310669d8674ff5764eb5987e.year = tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3.year and t65bedcdf310669d8674ff5764eb5987e.year IN (2018,2019,2020,2021,2022,2023) left join "player_seasonlogs" on "player_seasonlogs"."pid" = "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid" and player_seasonlogs.year = tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3.year and "player_seasonlogs"."seas_type" = 'REG' left join "opening_days" on "opening_days"."year" = "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."year" left join "keeptradecut_rankings" as "t110e335d6cf25991e052056ab308d608" on "t110e335d6cf25991e052056ab308d608"."pid" = "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid" and "t110e335d6cf25991e052056ab308d608"."qb" = 2 and "t110e335d6cf25991e052056ab308d608"."type" = 1 and "t110e335d6cf25991e052056ab308d608"."d" = EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (date_trunc('day', opening_days.opening_day) + interval '1 year'))::integer and opening_days.year = (tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3.year) where "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."scoring_format_hash" = 'ad64bf40cdfec0a1ebdf66453fa57687832f7556f3870251c044d5d270fc089e' and player.pos IN ('WR') group by player.fname, player.lname, "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."points_per_game", "t65bedcdf310669d8674ff5764eb5987e"."weighted_opp_rating_from_plays", "player_seasonlogs"."espn_overall_score", "t110e335d6cf25991e052056ab308d608"."v", "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."year", "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 4 DESC NULLS LAST, "tbc0f47cfe59a1398fb0e9c78eb43bba3"."pid" asc limit 500
